ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED( Cents_kW_DC_Up_Front__c ), ISCHANGED( Cents_kW_DC_First_Bill_Paid__c ) , ISCHANGED( Cents_kW_DC_First_Bill__c ), ISCHANGED( Type__c ), ISCHANGED(Product__c)), ISNEW()=false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't edit commission structures once they've been created!
